articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister on DPRK Government's Stand
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister on DPRK Government's Stand
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, who is participating in the 72nd UN General Assembly, made a speech at the plenary session of the UN General Assembly on September 23.
					 He said:
					
					 I feel forced to make comments on the speech uttered 4 days ago by someone called the U.S. president that rendered this sacred UN arena tainted.
					
					 Since Trump uttered such reckless and violent words provoking the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and threatening the DPRK at this very platform, I think it is fair enough for me to make a response in the corresponding tone.
					
					 The absurd reality that the person like Trump, a mentally deranged person full of megalomania and complacency, the person who is chastised even by American people as "commander in grief", "lying king", "president evil" is holding the seat of the U.S. president, and the dangerous reality that the gambler who grew old using threats, frauds and all other schemes to acquire a patch of land holds the nuclear button; these are what constitute the gravest threat to the international peace and security today.
					
					 Due to his lacking of basic common knowledge and proper sentiment, he tried to insult the supreme dignity of my country by referring it to a rocket. By doing so, however, he committed an irreversible mistake of making our rockets' visit to the entire U.S. mainland inevitable all the more.
					
					 Trump might not have been aware what is uttered from his mouth but we will make sure that he bears consequences far beyond his words, far beyond the scope of what he can handle even if he is ready to do so.
					
					 At this forum, I would like to once again remind all the distinguished delegates of the unjust and unfair nature of the "resolutions" adopted by the Security Council against the DPRK.
					
					 First, the Security Council fabricated illegal and double-standard "resolutions" which only prohibit the satellite launch of the DPRK in violation of the international law prescribing peaceful use of outer space as a sovereign right of every state and without taking any issue with all other satellite launching countries.
					
					 Second, the Security Council cooked up illegal and double-standard "resolutions" which arbitrarily prohibit only the nuclear tests of the DPRK, although nuclear test strictly belongs to the sovereignty of every state since the international law on prohibition of nuclear test has not yet entered into force and there are countries that conducted many more nuclear tests.
					
					 Third, the Security Council condemned the development of nuclear weapons by the DPRK as a "threat to international peace and security" and, on that basis, fabricated illegal and double-standard "resolutions" in contravention of Article 51 of the UN Charter which recognizes the right to self-defense of every state and without calling into question the other countries that keep on developing latest nuclear weapons of various kinds.
					
					 The reason these unjust and unfair resolutions continue to be adopted is that the permanent members of the Security Council, all nuclear powers, have common interest in maintaining their monopolistic nuclear status.
					
					 If the "resolutions" on the DPRK adopted at the Security Council are truly lawful and fair, there will be no need that all U.S. ambassadors abroad and even the president and the state secretary turn out to coerce other countries into implementing the "resolutions".
					
					 The day will certainly come in near future when we settle all damages inflicted to our peaceful economic development and improvement of the people's livelihood and all the sufferings imposed on our innocent women, children and elderly by the heinous and barbaric sanctions against our Republic.
					
					 The unjust and contemptible acts such as turning a blind eye to the heinous acts of Israel patronized by the U.S. while condemning in every manner only the Syrian government fighting to protect its national sovereignty and security should not be tolerated any longer.
					
					 The DPRK government will certainly defend peace and security of the country with its powerful nuclear deterrence and also contribute to safeguarding world peace and security.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets UN Secretary General
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets UN Secretary General
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK who is head of the DPRK delegation to the 72nd UN General Assembly in New York, met and had a talk with UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres on Saturday.
					 The foreign minister reiterated the will of the DPRK to take the toughest countermeasures as regards the hysteric behavior of the U.S. chief executive who declared a war by threatening to "totally destroy" the DPRK and its people, something unprecedented in the UN arena.
					
					 He stressed that the UN should fulfill its duty and mission in realizing the international justice and guaranteeing the genuine peace and security of the world.
					
					 The secretary general expressed his view that the Korean peninsula issue should be solved in political and diplomatic way, not a military way.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Yong Ho met the foreign ministers of Cuba, Belarus and Sweden and permanent representatives of Bolivia, Kazakhstan and Senegal to the UN, the president of the 72nd Session of the UN General Assembly and the executive officer of the UNDP respectively.
					
					 The foreign ministers and permanent representatives of different countries expressed understanding of the principled stand of the DPRK on the situation on Korean peninsula and agreed to develop the friendly and cooperative relations and further strengthen the mutual cooperation in the UN arena.
					
					 The president of UNGA expressed deep concern over the growing tension on the Korean peninsula, saying that all the issues should be settled in political and diplomatic way and the executive officer of the UNDP expressed his opinion on the development of cooperative relations between the UN and the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Maniacs Will Be Tamed with Fire: KAPPC
articles.content:
U.S. Maniacs Will Be Tamed with Fire: KAPPC
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee (KAPPC) issued a statement on Sunday.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The statement issued by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un before the world on Sept. 21 as regards the speech of the U.S. president at the UN General Assembly is the voice reflecting the surging resentment and hatred of the Korean army and people against the U.S. imperialists and a declaration of justice for merciless retaliation of the independent people against injustice.
					
					 It is also a declaration of the toughest counteraction of Juche Korea wringing the necks of Trump and the empire of America and a meaningful warning to the disgusting behaviors of the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries clapping the dog's barking of their master and fawning upon him.
					
					 And it is a stern warning to the disgraceful acts done by big powers going impertinent while claiming that the DPRK "should not take a dangerous road any longer". They cried out for strictly implementing the "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK by "international unity" and "global cooperation" at the recent UN General Assembly forum and whenever an opportunity presented itself.
					
					 The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee fully supports the just principled statement of the peerlessly great man, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Trump unhesitatingly talked "total destruction" and annihilation of one country, one state and one nation at the official appearance of the UN General Assembly. His reckless remarks show that neither peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region including the Korean peninsula nor global peace and security can be guaranteed as long as the U.S., the empire of evils, is allowed to exist.
					
					 We do not regard Trump's reckless remarks as his impromptu address or his individual willingness. They are a reflection of the notorious hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S., and a revelation of the U.S. brigandish intention to totally destroy the Korean people.
					
					 We have repeatedly warned the Trump administration of its reckless nuclear war hysteria and sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 However, Trump, defying all these warnings, has driven the situation into the uncontrollable phase while letting out only invectives of madman such as symptoms of narcotic addiction.
					
					 A stick is fit for a rabid dog, and it is the best option to tame the dotard such as Trump with real acts as words do not work on him.
					
					 The warning of Songun Korea is not hot air and the army and people of the brilliant commander of Mt Paektu unconditionally do what they are determined to do.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in reckless military choice, misjudging our power and will, the destiny of the empire of America will lead to the most tragic end.
					
					 Those countries that have followed the U.S. going reckless as the absolute monarch on this planet had better look back on their inglorious behaviors and join in the just struggle against the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and aggression, though belatedly.
					
					 The UN, too, should put an end to the inglorious acts in which it has left only disgraces after being reduced into the puppet and waiting maid of the U.S., and should not allow repetition of such abnormal happenings as offering the inviolable UN forum to madman Trump so that he makes reckless remarks.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that the historic statement of the chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission is the statement of the heroic Korean people living for independence and justice and the worldwide statement carrying the demand of progressive mankind loving peace.

articles.title: Statement of KSDP on Trump's Violent Remarks
articles.content:
Statement of KSDP on Trump's Violent Remarks
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party (KSDP) in a statement on Sunday stressed that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's recent statement is a stern declaration on bitterest miserable end to Trump, the ringleader of aggressors who challenged the DPRK with violent remarks, and an expression of the great Paektusan nation's steadfast will to totally erase the U.S., an empire of evils, from the earth.
					 It is an eruption of the Korean people's towering wrath and hatred toward the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemy, and a warning of history that the highhanded and arbitrary act of the U.S. can be no longer tolerated, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The KSDP fully supports the statement of the chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission that solemnly declared the resolute decision and will to defend the sovereignty and right to existence of our dignified state, people and nation and mercilessly punish with fire the gangster-like U.S. imperialists seeking to enslave the whole world.
					
					 Trump's remarks that he would "totally destroy" our state is the most ferocious declaration of war against the DPRK, and such inhuman words can be made only by descendents of American cannibals who grew up on the grave of Indians.
					
					 He talked at a UN General Assembly such utterances that they would annihilate one country and nation. It showed that he is a rare imbecile devoid of capability to control his tongue and ignorant rouge rather than a politician.
					
					 His reckless remarks make even those with normal thinking faculty lose discretion and composure, and they hint that the U.S. may start its rash military adventure any moment while showing its administration's hot-tempered state.
					
					 Anyhow, Trump and the U.S. are sadly mistaken.
					
					 The Korean people are not frightened at such violent remarks by Trump little different from a mentally deformed, and any "sanctions and pressure" can never stop their advance.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that all its anti-DPRK deeds will be settled strictly and it will get further distressed before meeting a miserable end with passage of time.
					
					 The KSDP, which regards independence as its guiding idea and aspires after human, national and global independence, are convinced that all the progressive political parties and organizations around the world will steadily extend full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people and turn out in the vigorous struggle to oppose the U.S. impudent, highhanded and arbitrary practices and build a free and peaceful, new world.

articles.title: CCNR Advises U.S. to Consider Statement of DPRK SAC Chairman
articles.content:
CCNR Advises U.S. to Consider Statement of DPRK SAC Chairman
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Consultative Council for National Reconciliation (CCNR) issued a statement on Sunday to fully support the statement of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, which solemnly declared that he would surely and definitely tame Trump, an ignorant war maniac, with fire.
					 Trump, a mad dotard, blared that he would "totally destroy" the Korean nation, daring hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership. His sophism revealed the U.S. imperialists' heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK and ambition to stifle it by force, which has been persistently pursued century after century, the CCNR said, adding:
					
					 The recent remarks of this mentally deranged person fully laid bare the ferociousness, cruelty and aggressive nature of the cannibals that built the U.S., an empire of evils, on the death of Indians.
					
					 The Korean people, who have suffered from the division of the nation forced by outsiders for more than half century, are wishing for the national reconciliation, unity and reunification more ardently than ever before.
					
					 The reckless remarks of Trump and his coteries and their ceaseless moves for invading the DPRK more clearly show that not only the reconciliation and unity of one nation but also national reunification the Koreans want so ardently cannot be achieved as long as the U.S., the empire of evils, exists.
					
					 That's why they are unanimously shouting with century-old resentment toward the wolf-like U.S. imperialists; "Annihilate the U.S. imperialist aggressors, sworn enemy!" and "Blow up the U.S. land as a whole with nukes and H-bombs of Juche!"
					
					 The mad dotard and his hirelings across the ocean can never avoid the fate of final doom though they make every desperate effort. Merciless punishment only is awaiting the aggressors and provocateurs.
					
					 The U.S. should not remain indifferent to the resolute decision and solemn declaration of the brilliant commander of Mt Paektu that we will surely make the U.S. pay for Trump's rude nonsense calling for "totally destroying" our state and nation while insulting our supreme leadership and whatever Trump might have expected, he will face results beyond his expectation.

articles.title: Rally of SPA Presidium, Cabinet, Ministries and National Institutions Blasts Trump's Rubbish
articles.content:
Rally of SPA Presidium, Cabinet, Ministries and National Institutions Blasts Trump's Rubbish
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- There was a rally of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Cabinet, ministries and national institutions at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday to vow to achieve the final victory through all-out charge in showdown with the U.S.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, and other senior state officials, and officials of the SPA Presidium, Cabinet, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju read out the statement of Chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made at the rally.
					
					 Sin Yong Chol, director of the Political Bureau of the Cabinet, said that the statement of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was the resolute ultimatum sent by a tiger of Mt. Paektu to wipe out the U.S., the land of crimes, from the earth, and a volcano-like eruption of the faith and will of the entire army and all the people to certainly give vent to the pent-up wrath through the all-out charge against the wolf-like U.S. imperialists, kingpin of aggression and war.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists bring the dark clouds of a war to this land, we will most miserably and most mercilessly punish the aggressors and provokers through all-people resistance, he noted.
					
					 He called on all the officials to cherish the immutable faith that the final victory will be guaranteed in the road of following respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, and courageously turn out in the do-or-die battle against the U.S.
					
					 Kim Man Su, minister of Electric Power Industry, said that now that the gangster-like U.S. imperialists made the most ferocious declaration of a war against the DPRK, it is the fixed will of the Korean people to make them pay a thousand-fold price for the senseless remarks.
					
					 He pledged to supply electricity needed for bolstering the state nuclear force, building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living in the spirit of setting on fire the citadel of  the U.S. imperialists, evil empire and kingpin of aggression. 
					
					 Kim Myong Chol, department director of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, said that we will beat mad Trump with nuclear fists of justice so that the U.S. warmongers would not let out rubbish again and not run amuck before the DPRK, and all the service personnel and people will become bullets and bombs to bring to an end the century-old confrontation with the U.S. with our exciting victory.
					
					 He said that we would channel all efforts into increasing the national power in every way, give further play to the political and ideological advantages and might of Korean-style socialism and successfully carry out the party's plan of building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 He stressed the need to further consolidate the state and social system, strengthen organization and guidance over the institution of laws and law-abiding life and thus firmly guarantee by law the all-people general charge for implementing the decision of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, said that it is the wildest dream and the biggest miscalculation to think that the DPRK which has been put on the strongest position in the world defying the harshest sanctions in the world would be browbeaten by the senseless acts made by the deranged persons fond of playing with fire.
					
					 He noted that we will smash the U.S. imperialists' barbarous sanctions and fully displaying the might of self-reliance of Juche Korea by making in a consecutive way scientific and technological achievements substantially conducive to the building of an economic power and a highly civilized country and improving the standard of people's living true to the Party's idea of prioritizing science and technology.
					
					 He made a pledge to devotedly safeguard the Party Central Committee and glorify our country as the best scientific and technological power in the world.

articles.title: Servicepersons of Ministry of People's Security Meet
articles.content:
Servicepersons of Ministry of People's Security Meet 
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Ministry of People's Security met Saturday to vow to win the final victory through all-out charge in the confrontation with the U.S. 
					 Present at the meeting were Minister of People's Security Choe Pu Il and other senior officials of the ministry and servicepersons of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF).
					
					 Choe Pu Il read out the statement of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made by KPISF Colonel General Kang Phil Hun, KPISF Lieut. General Kim Jong Ho, KPISF Major General Jo Pyong Sik and KPISF Colonel Ham Kyong Il.
					
					 The speakers said that the statement of the chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission carrying his firm faith and resolute will was a declaration of the great victory of Juche Korea as it firmly protected dignity and honor of our state and people and mercilessly sentenced the U.S., chieftain of aggression and war, to death.
					
					 They denounced Trump's remarks as extremely brutal invective which could be made by the peerless cannibals, Yankees of the empire of devils in the 21st century, who are persistently trying to topple the socialist bulwark of Korea on this planet and obliterate the Korean nation. 
					
					 The rubbish of Trump, boss of cannibals, to destroy populace of 25 million of the DPRK is the sophism of psychopath breathing his last  breath and the last-ditch effort to check the advance of the DPRK dashing forward for bright future, the speakers said, and went on:
					
					 Trump's rubbish is the most ferocious declaration of war unprecedented in history of the preceding presidents of the U.S., and our army and people will surely force him to pay a thousand-fold price for his remarks with the toughest counterattack in history.
					
					 The wolf-like U.S. imperialists fattened on evils should be finished by only arms. We will put the human reject, politically immature guy and boss of gangs Trump and his yes men into the cesspool of history as they are working hard to destroy the DPRK.
					
					 The world will clearly see how miserable fate the U.S. imperialists meet before the army and people of the DPRK, the speakers noted, expressing the will to settle accounts with the anti-U.S. struggle by burning the stronghold of evils at a go if the enemies ignite a war of aggression at any cost.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. imperialist aggressors may try, our state, social system and people are steadfast and all our servicepersons will confidently advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of the Party to the last, they stressed.
					
					 They pledged to become strong fighters in the class struggle as required by the situation at the door of the final battle against the U.S. imperialists, suppress the enemies' insidious maneuvers in time, guarantee the great revolutionary advance for the final victory and reliably protect lives and properties of the people.
					
					 They underscored the need for all the servicepersons of the KPISF to be ones with strong idea and faith and manifold shields equipped with the transparent spirit of defending the leader unto death and ardent Kim Jong Il's patriotism and thus safeguard the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un at the cost of their lives politico-ideologically.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square on September 23 to vow to turn out in the anti-U.S. showdown to achieve the final victory.
					 The square was crowded with more than 10 000 people from all walks of life full of the spirit of annihilating the enemies.
					
					 Present at the rally were Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials of institutions, factories and enterprises, working people, youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Su Gil read out the statement of Chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made at the rally.
					
					 Choe Hak Chol, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, said that all the Party members and people in Pyongyang are aflame with the will to completely remove the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy, from the globe.
					
					 He noted that in order to cope with the reckless moves of the U.S. imperialists aimed at doing harm to the supreme dignity of the DPRK, we will do all the party's organizational and political work with priority given to defending the leader and to turn Pyongyang into an impregnable fortress to safeguard the leader so that any enemy dares not provoke.
					
					 Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, branded Trump's most ignorant remarks ever known in history as the biggest unpardonable mud-slinging at the dignified DPRK and an undisguised declaration of war.
					
					 Trump's death-bed remarks clearly proved that the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts with which invincible military capacities have been increased in the face of the vicious sanctions and pressure of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces was absolutely right and that it is the line to be upheld to the last, he said.
					
					 He underscored the need to bring about eye-opening successes in economic construction and the improvement of people's living standard in the capital city in the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of protecting the country.
					
					 Ri Il Bae, a commanding officer of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, called upon all the units of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards to turn villages and worksites into impregnable fortresses and today's Xiaowangqing guerrilla zone and bring about the greatest innovations and leap forward under the uplifted banner of self-reliance so as to frustrate the enemy's war provocations, sanctions and blockade.
					
					 We are waiting for the moment of final decisive battle to remove the U.S., empire of evil, from the globe, he said, added that once respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un issues an order, we will annihilate the group of aggressors with the arms of revolution.
					
					 Pak Song Chol, first secretary of the youth league committee of Kim Il Sung University, said that the statement of respected Supreme Leader indicative of his high responsibility for the destiny and future of the country and the people and his strong pluck to remain unshaken by any tempests is an attack order calling all the youth in the capital city to the do-or-die battle.
					
					 He called for opening up the route of charge for annihilating the enemies by taking the lead in the sacred battle for wiping out the Yankees from the earth to the last man, for the honor of the great Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Then there was a mass demonstration.
					
					 Reaching far and wide were shouts and calls of high-spirited demonstrators full of the stamina not to miss the golden opportunity for giving vent to pent-up wrath of the Korean people but to wipe out the U.S. group of ignorant gangsters letting loose such invectives as "total destruction".

articles.title: Youth and Students Meet
articles.content:
Youth and Students Meet
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the youth and students took place at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre on Saturday to win the final victory through all-out charge in the showdown with the U.S.
					 Attending the meeting were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league, youth and students.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, read out the statement of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made by Pak Chol Min, secretary of the C.C., youth league, Mun Chol, first secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the youth league, Kim Yong Mi, worker of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, and Choe Wi Song, pupil of Mangyongdae District Kim Ju Hyok Senior Middle School.
					
					 Speakers said that the U.S. imperialist beasts made unethical remarks that they would "totally destroy" the DPRK before the world and thus fully revealed the dirty true color of the war rogue and gangster-like state fond of playing with fire.
					
					 Saying that the reckless remarks made by the "political layman" and "political heretic" are the most ferocious declaration of war against the DPRK, they stressed, adding: We can never pardon the most imprudent and heinous enemies.
					
					 Upon hearing the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the young vanguard are turning out at one in the sacred war against the U.S. with the tough readiness for the final decisive battle, they pointed out.
					
					 They underlined the need for the officials of the youth league and young people to become fighters of human bombs reducing the citadel of the enemies to ashes by turning out as one in the final sacred war to annihilate the U.S. imperialists once a red signal flare of the Supreme Command arches.
					
					 We will wage a more dynamic struggle for creating the Mallima speed to shatter the ferocious sanctions of the imperialists in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and thus deal a deadly sledge-hammer strike to the enemies crying out for destroying the DPRK, they noted.
					
					 They said that they will unhesitatingly sacrifice youth and life for the one motherland if the day of decisive battle comes, cherishing deep in mind that our happiness and hope of bright future are guaranteed by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Final Victory Is Ours: DPRK Army and People
articles.content:
Final Victory Is Ours: DPRK Army and People
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK army and people turned out as one in the anti-U.S. confrontation with towering hatred against Trump who made unprecedented rude nonsense of wiping the DPRK of 25 million people off the map on the UN arena.
					 All the officers and men of the Korean People's Army (KPA) are keeping highly alerted for the moment of decisive battle, while citizens across the country petitioning to be allowed to join or rejoin the KPA.
					
					 From every corner of the country can be heard calls for taking revenge upon American war maniacs and loud-sounding songs like "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order".
					
					 Pak Yong Gol, a farmer of the Sambong Cooperative Farm in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					 Trump, a living corpse, got so senile as to dig his own grave.
					
					 It is high time to avenge the Korean nation upon the mentally deranged dotard by beheading him.
					
					 Kim Sun Chol, an official of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, said:
					
					 Trump, nicknamed "incompetent man", "liar" and others, is a scum and political dreg. No place in human society is available for such beastly dotard.
					
					 The old rabid dog should be sent to the gallows in time, so that the U.S. and its vassal forces could be keenly aware of that no one can block the advance of the DPRK toward a powerful socialist country and the earth can never exist without the DPRK.
					
					 Choe Tong Hyok, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 It is not too much to say that the U.S. was doomed at the moment when Trump made heinous remarks of "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					
					 The Trump's group of heinous aggressors scheming to violate the sovereignty of Juche Korea and its rights to existence and development and even to totally destroy the Korean nation will surely pay dearly for defaming our country and people.
					
					 We, Hwasong artillerymen, will wipe the U.S. off the map by showering an unprecedented fire of merciless revenge upon American war maniacs.
					
					 The U.S. has courted its total destruction.
					
					 The final victory in the anti-U.S. confrontation is ours.

articles.title: DPRK People Vow to Wipe out American War Maniacs
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow to Wipe out American War Maniacs
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK are afire with hatred against Trump who dared gabble about "totally destroying" the Korean nation even on the UN arena.
					 Sin Kyong Chol, department director of the Ministry of Coal Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 Trump's unprecedented rude nonsense one has never heard from any of his predecessors clearly showed the world his true color as a "political layman", "political heretic" and wrecker of the world peace and security. Therefore, even Americans nicknamed him "top lunatic of Washington" and "Pinocchio president".
					
					 There is no remedy but a shower of fire for such war maniac running amuck like a moth attracted to fire.
					
					 Ri Chang Yong, head of a department of Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies, said:
					
					 Trump, who began his presidency with troubling the whole world, is not a politician but a villain.
					
					 Not content with taking the most barbarous and brutal sanctions against the DPRK, he even let loose the unpardonable blast that he would "totally destroy" the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK possessed of the strongest nuclear weapons and military hardware will surely and mercilessly exterminate those Trump-led war maniacs.

articles.title: Successful Players at Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship Feted
articles.content:
Successful Players at Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship Feted
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Cabinet of the DPRK gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant Sunday for players who proved successful at the 10th Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship.
					 Present there were Kim Phyong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Ko Kil Son, minister of Oil Industry who is chairman of the Korean Acrobatic Gymnastic Association, officials concerned, players and coaches and their families.
					
					 Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho in a congratulatory speech underlined the need for the players and coaches to cherish the warm solicitude of the mother Party and become genuine sports persons of the Party and the country winning only victories in the international games with redoubled efforts.
					
					 Player Jong Kum Hwa in her reply evinced a pledge to flutter higher the flag of the DPRK at international contests and powerfully demonstrate the dignity and might of Juche Korea.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Visit Area of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Visit Area of Mt Paektu
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials visited the area of Mt Paektu on September 22 and 23 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation.
					 The guests laid bouquets at a mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt Paektu at Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Being briefed on his revolutionary career in the yard of his old home, they went round relics preserved there.
					
					 They toured Mt Paektu.
					
					 They also went round the Samjiyon Grand Monument and the Chongbong Bivouac which convey the anti-Japanese revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK Team Wins Title of 2017 AFC U-16 Women's Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Team Wins Title of 2017 AFC U-16 Women's Championship
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team won the title of the 2017 AFC U-16 Women's Championship held in Thailand.
					 It beat its Chinese rival 1:0 in the semi-finals.
					
					 It won the title by defeating its south Korean rival 2:0 in the finals on September 23, winning the berth to the 2018 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup to be held in Uruguay on November, 2018.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Qualified for 2018 AFC U-16 Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Qualified for 2018 AFC U-16 Championship
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Group F matches for the 2018 AFC U-16 Championship took place in Taipei of China from September 16 to 24.
					 In the group F the DPRK team played matches with teams of Hong Kong of China, Macao of China, Brunei and Taipei of China.
					
					 It beat Chinese Macao team 10:0, Brunei team 9:0 and team of Taipei of China 7:0.
					
					 Its game with Hong Kong of China ended in 2:0 on Sunday.
					
					 It took the first place in the group and won the berth to the 2018 AFC U-16 Championship.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Japan's Sinister Intention to Revise Pacifist Constitution
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Japan's Sinister Intention to Revise Pacifist Constitution
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Days ago, Ishiba, ex-chief secretary of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan, said that the existence of the "Self-Defense Forces" should be specified in the constitution by revising the paragraph 2 of Article 9 and Komura, vice-president of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan, expressed his view in front of media to present the amendment to the constitution in the regular Diet session next year.
					 Minju Joson on Sunday says in a commentary this clearly reveals the intention of Abe's regime crazy for revising the constitution.
					
					 It says:
					
					 Abe's regime has already formulated the "timetable for revising the constitution" which clarifies that it will present the amendment to the constitution in the regular Diet session next year and will enforce the revised constitution in 2020.
					
					 Abe's regime is busy presenting the amendment to the constitution of the Liberal Democratic Party to the Screening Council and discussing it with different parties in order not to delay the "timetable".
					
					 Abe's regime is so impatient to revise the "Pacifist Constitution" as soon as possible. Why? It is because the "Pacifist Constitution" serves as a brake to the war carriage running toward the realization of the wild ambition for the revival of militarism and aggression upon other countries.
					
					 It's the wild ambition of Abe's regime to turn Japan into a country capable of carrying out aggressive wars anytime by removing this brake as early as possible.
					
					 The specification of the existence of the "Self-Defense Forces" is the main purpose of the constitutional revision.
					
					 Japan is barred from going to a war and has no right to possess the three wings of armed forces and other combat capabilities due to the article 9 of the constitution. It is trying to give the "Self-Defense Forces" the complete legal status as aggressive ones by revising the constitution.
					
					 The reckless behavior of the Japanese reactionaries whetting the sword for reinvasion by putting the "Pacifist Constitution" on the chopping board clearly proves how frantic Abe's regime is to realize the wild ambition for the revival of militarism and invasion upon other countries.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces An Chol Su for His Act of Treachery
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces An Chol Su for His Act of Treachery
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- An Chol Su, representative of the "Kukmin Party" of south Korea, is engrossed in act of treachery blatantly challenging the trend of the times and candlelight mindset of the people, fully taking off the mask of "middle-of-the road politician" in quest of power.
					Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					It is a widely known fact that people of various circles in south Korea criticized An Chol Su as a "politician of nature remaining ambiguous" and "political snob who is greedy for power and narrow-minded" from the very day he appeared in the political camp.
					
					He worked with bloodshot eyes to become the representative of the "Kukmin Party", a party of migratory birds and group of political tricksters, which go shameless without judging the consequences, obsessed with partisan interests and greed for power. Such fact shows well what he is like.
					
					As soon as he took the office of the representative, he played a duet fiddle with the conservative group, letting out reckless confrontation remarks against the fellow countrymen in the north. His ill-natured behavior is nothing different from traitor Park Geun Hye and her conspirators.
					
					It is needless to say that what An is doing is acts of treachery without parallel as they help pave the way for the groups of the conservative opposition parties on the brink of collapse and trample down the achievements of the candlelight actions.

articles.title: Koreans in China Hit out at Trump's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Koreans in China Hit out at Trump's Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China said in a statement on September 22 that it is necessary to definitely tame the mentally deranged U.S. dotard and his coteries with fire.
					 The statement charged that U.S. President Trump, at the 72nd UN General Assembly, spit out unprecedented rubbish that he would wipe the country of 25 million people off the map, not just "regime change".
					
					 His remarks fully revealed his dirty colors as a war merchant who grew corpulent at the cost of the blood of mankind as well as the despicable image of the U.S. which has mercilessly disturbed global peace and reconciliation and friendship with hegemony and high-handed force, showing off its military muscle as the chieftain of aggression unaware of what is the UN's mission, it said, adding:
					
					 The world will clearly see what price Trump, an old mad gangster, will have to pay for his provocative remarks.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that nobody can dare to hurt the dignity of the nuclear power of Juche, a single-mindedly united socialist power, and the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. is in store for the DPRK.

articles.title: Trump Criticized by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Trump Criticized by Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on September 19 posted on an internet homepage Marcia Verde an article denouncing the U.S. chief executive who let out a flurry of sophism at the United Nations.
					 Referring to the fact that U.S. President Trump blared at the UN General Assembly he would totally destroy the DPRK, the article said:
					
					 His vile remarks are inviting sneers and criticism from all people.
					
					 The U.S. has tried to stifle north Korea for several decades.
					
					 The Korean War was a war of genocide ignited by the U.S.
					
					 However, the Korean people worked a historic miracle by defeating the U.S., which boasted of being the strongest in the world, and its followers under the guidance of General Kim Il Sung.
					
					 After the war the U.S. has ceaselessly staged war drills for aggression on north Korea and threatened it even with nukes.
					
					 It is quite natural for north Korea to react against such provocations.
					
					 North Korea, exposed to extreme threat from outside, has the right to mobilize every means such as nuclear deterrence in order to safeguard its people and territory.
					
					 It is nothing but miscalculation of Trump fond of making reckless remarks to expect the U.S. "victory" in the showdown with the DPRK possessed of H-bomb and ICBM.
					
					 The homepage carried a photo satirically depicting Trump in the toilet stool.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Arton Publishing House of Russia brought out in pamphlet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" on September 18 with the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK as an occasion.
					 In the work, a congratulatory speech to the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations held on June 6, Juche 101 (2012) to celebrate the KCU's 66th birthday, Kim Jong Un expressed his firm will to invariably inherit the noble outlook of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the future and posterity.
					
					 He also indicated the tasks and ways for training the KCU members to be knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy reserves that will shoulder the future destiny of the country and the nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Spain, Germany, Britain and India from Sept. 6 to 16 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 At the seminar held by the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the main content of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Further Strengthen the People's Government" was briefed on to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader who founded the DPRK and put the people who had been plundered and oppressed as the proud master of the state and society.
					
					 They said that under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the DPRK was developed into the people's government in which the state serves the popular masses, and successes were registered day after day.
					
					 They stressed that only victory and honor will be in store for the Korean people as they are led by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the seminars held in Germany and Britain, speakers praised the DPRK for invariably enforcing the people-oriented politics such as the free medical care and free education. This is the fruition of the loving care of the great leaders of the DPRK for the people, they added.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il referred to the fact that the DPRK has only win victories in the showdown with the imperialists.
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically advancing towards a powerful socialist nation, united close around Kim Jong Un, he said, noting that the DPRK will prosper forever as it is led by the outstanding leader.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Hailed by Swedish, Russian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Hailed by Swedish, Russian Organizations
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Swedish and Russian organizations issued statements on September 5 in connection with the DPRK's successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test.
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said that the DPRK's successful H-bomb test is a signal demonstration of bolstering up military capabilities and an important measure for defending peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 The DPRK which has been put on the position of a nuclear weapons power serves as a model of the progressive people struggling for independence, it noted.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation said that nuclear deterrence for the Korean people serves as a reliable guarantee for the security and prosperity of the country and, therefore, the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is a legitimate right of a sovereign state.

articles.title: RPDC defendera con disuasivo nuclear paz y seguridad del Estado, senala Ri Yong Ho
articles.content:
RPDC defendera con disuasivo nuclear paz y seguridad del Estado, senala Ri Yong Ho 
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El canciller Ri Yong Ho, quien preside la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU, pronuncio el dia 23 en la sesion plenaria de la Asamblea General de la ONU. 
					Ante todo, refiriendose a su voluntad de comentar el discurso pronunciado hace unos dias por el llamado presidente estadounidense que ha ensuciado el sagrado lugar de la ONU, el canciller dijo: 
					
					Puesto que Trump solto en esta plataforma los disparates imprudentes y violentos atacando a la suprema dignidad de la RPDC y amenazando a nuestro pais, creo que debo responderle naturalmente con el mismo modo de hablar.
					
					Hoy en dia, la maxima amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales lo constituyen precisamente las realidades absurdas en que la presidencia norteamericana esta ocupada por un tipejo como Trump que es psicopata lleno de megalomania y complacencia y se llama por los habitantes estadounidenses como "comandante que crea maximo dolor", "rey de embustes" y "mal presidente" y en que el boton nuclear de EE.UU. esta en manos del jugador de azar que en toda su vida perpetro toda clase de amenazas, fraudes y artimanas para adquirir una parcela de tierra. 
					
					Por falta de conocimientos basicos y sentimientos, Trump trato de insultar la suprema dignidad de mi pais relacionandola con el cohete, debido a lo cual el ha cometido un irreversible error que hizo mas inevitable la visita de nuestros cohetes a todo el territorio principal de EE.UU. 
					
					Trump no se habria dado cuenta del sentido de las palabras pronunciadas por si mismo. Pero, haremos sin falta que el sufrira las consecuencias mas duras que sus palabras y las que el no puede responsabilizarse.
					
					En cuanto a las injustas y desiguales "resoluciones" anti-RPDC fabricadas por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, el canciller coreano dijo:
					
					Primero, el Consejo de Seguridad fabrico las "resoluciones" ilegales y de doble rasero, que prohiben solo el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC en violacion de la ley internacional que prescribe el uso pacifico del cosmos como un derecho soberano de cada pais, sin cuestionar nada a otros paises que lanzan satelites. 
					
					Segundo, invento las "resoluciones" ilegales y de doble rasero que prohiben arbitrariamente solo las pruebas nucleares de la RPDC, pese a la realidad en que la prueba nuclear pertenece estrictamente a la soberania de cada pais, dado que la ley internacional sobre la prohibicion de prueba nuclear no ha entrado todavia en vigencia, sin cuestionar nada a otros paises que realizaron mucho mas las pruebas nucleares. 
					
					Tercero, en desacuerdo con el Articulo 51 de la Carta de la ONU que reconoce el derecho a la autodefensa de cada Estado y sin cuestionar a otros paises que siguen desarrollando nuevas armas nucleares de diferentes tipos, fabrico las "resoluciones" ilegales y de doble rasero que califican el desarrollo de armas nucleares de la RPDC como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" y le dio, a base de ello, las sanciones.
					
					Se adoptan de continuo estas injustas y desiguales resoluciones, lo cual se debe a que los miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad, potencias nucleares, tienen el interes comun en mantener su posicion nuclear monopolistica. 
					
					Si las "resoluciones" anti-RPDC adoptadas por el Consejo de Seguridad fueran legales e imparciales de veras, EE.UU. no tendria necesidad de movilizar no solo a todos sus embajadores en el extranjero, sino tambien al presidente y al secretario de Estado para obligar a otros paises la implementacion de las "resoluciones". 
					
					En el futuro no lejano vendra sin falta el dia en que se saldaran cuenta de todos los danos causados al desarrollo economico y la mejora de la vida del pueblo y a las mujeres, los ninos y los ancianos inocentes por las abominables y barbaras sanciones contra la RPDC. 
					
					No deben ser tolerados mas los actos injustos y groseros de hacer vista gorda a las atrocidades de Israel bajo el abrigo de EE.UU. y de condenar de todos modos solo al gobierno sirio que lucha por la defensa de la soberania y estabilidad nacionales. 
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC defendera sin falta con sus propias fuerzas la paz y la seguridad del pais apoyandose en su poderoso disuasivo nuclear y contribuira a salvaguardar la paz y seguridad del mundo.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho se reune con secretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho se reune con secretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, quien preside la delegacion de la RPDC a la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU que tiene lugar en Nueva York, departio el dia 23 en la sede de la ONU con el secretario general de la ONU, Antonio Guterres.
					 Ri volvio a declarar la voluntad de reaccion superintransigente de la RPDC a la locura histerica del mandatario norteamericano que hizo la inaudita declaracion de guerra de "destruir totalmente" el Estado y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					  Hizo hincapie en que la ONU debe cumplir su deber y mision en realizar la justicia internacional y asegurar de veras la paz y seguridad del mundo.
					
					  Antonio Guterres expreso su criterio de que el problema de la Peninsula Coreana debe ser solucionado no por via militar, sino por el metodo politico y diplomatico.
					
					  Por otra parte, en el periodo de reunion, el canciller coreano se reunio con sus homologos de Cuba, Belarus y Suecia, los representantes permanentes de Bolivia, Kazajstan y Senegal en la ONU, el presidente de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU y el administrador del Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo, respectivamente.
					
					  En los encuentros los cancilleres y los representantes permanentes en la ONU de varios paises expusieron el entendimiento a la posicion de principios de la RPDC relativa a la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la voluntad de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion y fortalecer la colaboracion mutua en el escenario de la ONU.
					
					  El presidente de la Asamblea General de la ONU expreso la profunda preocupacion de la agravacion de la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana y dijo que hay que solucionar en lo politico y diplomatico todos los problemas.
					
					  A su vez, el administrador del Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo propuso su opinion sobre el problema del desarrollo de las relaciones de cooperacion entre la ONU y la RPDC.

articles.title: CCPAP decide domar con fuego a maniacos de EE.UU.
articles.content:
CCPAP decide domar con fuego a maniacos de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) publico el dia 24 una declaracion que sigue:
					El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, publico el dia 21 la declaracion historica en relacion con el discurso del presidente estadounidense pronunciado en la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					Esta declaracion deviene la griteria iracunda que refleja la indignacion y el odio del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea al imperialismo yanqui y la declaracion de venganza justa e implacable del pueblo independiente que no hace concesiones a la injusticia.
					
					Tambien, es la declaracion de reaccion superintransigente de Corea del Juche contra Trump y el imperio americano y la advertencia dura a los titeres surcoreanos y los reaccionarios japoneses que envian aplausos al disparate loco de su amo.
					
					Ademas, constituye la advertencia grave a los actos sucios de las potencias que en la reciente asamblea general de la ONU y otras ocasiones hablaron de la estricta ejecucion de la "resolucion de sancion" sobre la RPDC por la "unidad internacional" y la "cooperacion mundial" y actuan descaradamente aconsejandonos "no seguir mas el camino peligroso".
					
					 El Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) apoya absolutamente la justa posicion de principios declarada por el gran hombre sin par.
					
					 No consideramos la locura de Trump como la palabra improvisada de el ni como opinion individual.
					
					  Su disparate es el reflejo de la politica hostil anti-RPDC que ha venido persiguiendo EE.UU. y la demostracion de la malsana intencion gangsteril del imperio yanqui de exterminar a todo el pueblo coreano y toda la nacion coreana.
					
					  Hasta la fecha la RPDC dio advertencias suficientes a EE.UU. frente a la imprudente locura de guerra nuclear y la campana de sancion y presion de la administracion de Trump contra la RPDC.
					
					  Pero, Trump dio espalda tesoneramente a todas ellas y llevo la situacion al estado incontrolable dedicandose solo a los disparates locos como narcomano.
					
					  Igual con el refran "El perro loco merece la paliza" es mejor opcion domar con la accion real al vejete loco como Trump que no quiere prestar oidos a otros.
					
					  La Corea del Songun no habla por hablar y el ejercito y pueblo del Comandante Genial del Paektu cumplen sin falta lo que deciden.
					
					  Si EE.UU. escoge al fin la imprudente opcion militar juzgando erroneamente nuestra fuerza y voluntad, el imperio americano sufrira el destino mas tragico.
					
					  Aunque sea ahora, los paises que han venido siguiendo a ciegas a EE.UU. deben arrepentirse de sus conductas incompetentes y sumarse a la lucha justa contra al arbitrariedad, el despotismo y agresion de EE.UU.
					
					  La ONU tambien debe poner fin a la historia sucia llena de la verguenza y la ignominia convirtiendose en marioneta y sirviente de EE.UU. y no tiene que permitir la repeticion del caso anormal de ofrecer la sagrada plataforma de la ONU al loco Trump que suelta sin alguna vacilacion los disparates.  
					
					EE.UU. debe estar muy consciente de que la historica declaracion del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC es la declaracion del heroico pueblo coreano, que lucha por la independencia y la justicia, y la de todo el mundo que refleja la demanda de toda la humanidad progresista amante de la paz.

articles.title: CC de PSDC se burla del discurso violento de Trump
articles.content:
CC de PSDC se burla del discurso violento de Trump
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La declaracion del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, sentencio el fin mas tragico al caudillo de agresion, Trump, que desafia con el dislate trastornado a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y expuso la decision resuelta de la potencia Paektusan de eliminar completamente a EE.UU., imperio del mal. 
					Senala el Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea en su declaracion fechada 24 y continua:
					
					Al mismo tiempo, deviene la explosion de gran indignacion y colera del pueblo coreano a los imperialistas norteamericanos, enemigos jurados, y la advertencia de la historia de no tolerar nunca mas el despotismo, las arbitrariedades y la locura de EE.UU. que se porta imprudente e indiscreto. 
					
					El PSDC apoya totalmente la declaracion del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea quien declaro con solemnidad su decision resuelta de defender a toda costa la soberania y la subsistencia de nuestro prestigioso Estado, nuestro pueblo y nuestra nacion y castigar implacablemente con el fuego a los imperialistas norteamericanos que intentan esclavizar a todo el mundo. 
					
					La palabra violenta de Trump de "destruir totalmente" a la RPDC es la mas brutal declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC, Estado soberano. Pueden soltar tales disparates antieticos solo los descendientes de canibales americanos, nacidos sobre el monton de cadaveres de los indianos. 
					
					Trump, que lanzo no en su propia casa, sino en la reunion oficial de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el dislate de exterminar a un pais y una nacion, es el idiota, bribon y gangster que ya perdio completamente el control de habla en distincion del tiempo, el lugar y el contraparte. 
					
					El dislate de Trump, que deja perplejas hasta a las personas de sana mentalidad y les priva de la prudencia y paciencia, insinua la impaciencia de la administracion norteamericana en visperas del arruinamiento final y la aventura militar de EE.UU. que puede comenzar en cualquier momento. 
					
					Pero, estan equivocados Trump y EE.UU.
					
					El pueblo coreano no se asustara por la palabra violenta de un hombre deformado como Trump. Y ninguna forma de "sancion" y "presion" puede detener el avance de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente que se saldara cuenta estricta de todas sus fechorias anti-RPDC y se hara cada momento mas amargo su arruinamiento. 
					
					El PSDC, que aspira a la independencia del ser humano, la nacion y la humanidad tomando la independencia por su ideal directriz, esta seguro de que todos los partidos politicos y entidades progresistas del mundo enviaran de continuo el apoyo irrestricto y la solidaridad con la justa causa del pueblo coreano y se levantaran con dinamismo en la lucha contra el despotismo y arbitrariedades cinicos y barbaros de EE.UU. y por un nuevo mundo libre y pacifico.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe tratar con seriedad la declaracion de Kim Jong Un, advierte CRN
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe tratar con seriedad la declaracion de Kim Jong Un, advierte CRN
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 24, el Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional manifiesta el apoyo total a la declaracion solemne del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que anuncio solemnemente que domara sin falta con el fuego a Trump, maniaco de guerra y bribon, que actua indiscretamente para "destruir totalmente" a nuestro Estado, nuestra nacion y nuestro territorio.
					La sofisteria del vejete maniaco de guerra de EE.UU. de "extinguir completamente" a decenas de millones de coreanos insultando atrevidamente la suprema dignidad de la RPDC revela a todo el mundo la brutal politica hostil a la RPDC, que persigue EE.UU. generacion tras generacion y siglo tras siglo, y su ambicion de aplastar militarmente la RPDC, razon por la cual provoca la gran indignacion de todos los coreanos, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Siendo basura humana y cadaver vivo, Trump ya perdio el sano juicio y no tiene las cualidades y cortesia elementales del ser humano para no hablar del politico. 
					
					El dislate del viejo loco Trump revela de nuevo a todo el mundo la barbaridad y la agresividad de los canibales que edificaron el imperio del mal llamado Estados Unidos sobre el mar de sangre de los indianos. 
					
					La nacion coreana, que sufre durante mas de medio siglo la division nacional causada por las fuerzas extranjeras, aspira mas que nunca a la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Por tanto, todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana gritan unanimemente con arraigado rencor a las bestias norteamericanas: 
					
					"!Aniquilen a los agresores norteamericanos, enemigos jurados!"
					
					"!Que eliminemos completamente el territorio estadounidense con la bomba nuclear del Juche y la bomba H!"
					
					Por mas que desesperados que se hagan los esfuerzos del viejo maniaco estadounidense allende del oceano y sus lacayos, no pueden eludir el arruinamiento final que se acerca momento a momento. 
					
					Los agresores y provocadores sufriran el castigo implacable. 
					
					El pueblo coreano cobrara sin falta el precio del disparate de Trump sobre la "destruccion total" de nuestro Estado y nuestra nacion.
					
					EE.UU. debe tratar con seriedad la decision resuelta y la declaracion severa del Comandante Insigne del monte Paektu quien advirtio que Trump vera la consecuencia que sobrepasara su imaginacion.
